item.description:
Harvard is sponsoring an elaborate day of events for Charles Darwin's Birthday!

The Boston Atheists are helping to sponsor the party that night in the Queen's Head Pub.

Come down to cath up with you local unbelievers, meet some new people, have a few drinks, celebrate Darwin Day, and play some games.

This event had great turnout and a lot of fun last year (at Redline). The first 200 drink orders are free, so feel free to get there early. BA will be sponsoring a Darwinia trivia contest, the winner of which will get a gift basket stuffed with Darwin paraphenalia.

-------------------
8:00-10:00PM
Cambridge Queen's Head Pub
DARWIN DAY PARTY
- sponsored by the Humanist Association, featuring free drinks, live bands, and trivia contests
* SUPPORT student bands Robot Goes Here (Dave Rand, OEB graduate student) and Frequency (Jackson Kernion '12)!!
item.name: Darwin Day 200 @ Queen's Head Pub
